salaryExpectations: LKR 80,000 (Assistant QS) to LKR 700,000+ (Commercial Manager/Director) per month.
futureOutlook: Quantity surveyors are the financial backbone of the construction industry. As long as there is construction, there will be high demand for QSs. Professionals with internationally recognized charters (like RICS) have excellent opportunities for overseas employment, especially in the Middle East, which offers very high salaries.
